mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.coupon_name as couponName, c.discount, c.last_date as lastDate, c.is_active as isActive FROM member_coupon_tbl mc INNER JOIN coupon_tbl c ON mc.coupon_id = c.id WHERE mc.member_id = #{memberId} AND mc.is_used = false AND c.is_active = true AND c.last_date >= CURDATE() ORDER BY mc.created_at DESC
